excerpt.rendered:
Vial | 10 ml | gm
Active ingredients :
• Phosphatidylcholine
• Deoxy-cholate
• L-carnitine
• B-Complex
• Soy bean

Benefits :
• Emulsifies the fat, allowing it to be absorbed into the bloodstream and transported. This makes it the ideal solution for eliminating unattractive, localized adiposities.
• Elimination of excess fat in places that are hard to lose with physical exercise.
• Elimination of fat deposits of 2–15 cm over 3-4 treatment sessions.
• Improvement of micro-circulation & fat reduction through lipolysis.
• Stimulant effect and increases the mobilization of free fatty acids in the blood stream.

Lipolytic Cocktail for :
• Excessive weight and localization of fat deposits under the skin
• Destabilization of lipid exchange
• Cellulite

Areas of treatment :
• Abdomen
• Legs & arms
• Shoulders & backs
• Contours of the hips & buttocks

How to use ?
By injection
Dilution 1: 1 Proportion
